resources.string:
This app is part of a research study to improve music recommendation systems. Please read the terms of this study and additional information about your role as a research participant here.

By continuing, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and received a copy of the above consent agreement and desire of your own free will to participate in this study.

This app uploads your playlists to a server. The server compares them with playlists from other users and sends back a list of recommendations. Each recommended song is selected based on how similar it is to one of your playlists. The recommendations are automatically refreshed every seven days.

Currently, the app doesn’t retrieve any playlists you may have in Spotify, Google Music, Amazon Music or any other cloud music services. I’m planning to change that soon.

Thanks for contributing to our research project by using this app. Please send me an email with any feedback you have.
